Description:
Ensuring that equipment is installed correctly and safely.
Reviewing equipment installation standards and ensuring compliance with safety regulations.
Curate accurate reports based on compiled statistical information regarding site standards and equipment functions.
Identifying site and equipment liabilities to mitigate potential hazards and risks to employees.Skills
Skills:
Ability to lead others and work simultaneously as a member of a team.
Proficient with data documentation and familiar with software products, including MS Office.
A driven individual with an independent and collaborative spirit.
Familiar with computers and related software, including MS Office.
